name: vega-geo
description: Geographic data transforms for Vega dataflows.
author: Jeffrey Heer (http://idl.cs.washington.edu)

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-array:d3,d3-contour:d3,d3-geo:d3,vega-dataflow:vega,vega-projection:vega,vega-util:vega -f umd -n vega.transforms -o build/vega-geo.js -- index.js
